definition: to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: And there lies another source of sourness.
sentences.chinese: 此外還存在另一種使壞的根源。

sentences.english: Confront those who have hurt you; tell them how you feel.
sentences.chinese: 面對面向那個使壞的人，說出你的感受。

sentences.english: Shuagushihuai who will not only gentlemanly disdain it.
sentences.chinese: 耍滑使壞誰不會，只是君子不屑爲之。

definition: lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
to act stupid/to play dumb/to pretend to not know
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
